explanation: To determine whether MHD_get_connection_info participates in direct or indirect recursion, we must examine the implementation of every function it calls (and their transitive callees). MHD_get_connection_info only calls MHD_get_master (per the static call graph); therefore MHD_get_master is required so the next analyser can check whether MHD_get_master (or any function it calls) ever calls back to MHD_get_connection_info. Callers of MHD_get_master (those listed in the graph) are irrelevant for detecting a recursion cycle starting at MHD_get_connection_info — recursion requires a callee chain that returns to the original function, so only MHD_get_master and its transitive callees need to be inspected.
